content:
# The smelting process has successfully produced 1 unit of iron plate, and the furnace still has 7 units of iron ore remaining. 
# My inventory remains unchanged with 3 units of wood and 5 units of stone.

# Now that I have the iron plate, I can proceed to craft the burner mining drill. 
# I will check my inventory to ensure I have the required components for crafting.

# I need to ensure I have enough iron plates and wood to craft the burner mining drill.
assert inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 1, "Not enough iron plates to craft a burner mining drill"
assert inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.Wood, 0) >= 5, "Not enough wood to craft a burner mining drill"

# Now I will craft the burner mining drill.
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)  # Crafting the burner mining drill

# Checking inventory after crafting
print(f"Inventory after crafting the burner mining drill: {inspect_inventory()}")
